bibl.title: Appendix to an Article on the Chester-Beatty Papyrus of the Pauline Epistles known as P 46 in the Journal of Theological Studies No 150 setting forth here in Supplementary Detail the Shorter Text of that Important Document. - P 46 Addenda et Corrigenda.
